items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom will study French next year.
I don\'t think Tom would be willing to help us.
I don\'t think that Tom is planning to do that.
I don\'t think that Tom was kidding about that.
I knew it would never work between you and Tom.
I knew something like this was going to happen.
I can\'t stay here long, and Tom can\'t either.
America\'s economy is the largest in the world.
We\'re not the only ones who\'ve made mistakes.
I thought Tom didn\'t know how to speak French.
